data.text: @masteriggy @BigFulkin @RaniaKhalek Just because Lithuania is mainly a white country, you can’t assume they were colonists. There is no facts to prove they had any colonies.

@masteriggy @Xtrilo1Xtrilo @BigFulkin @RaniaKhalek They became the largest country through war and marriages. They didn't colonize the Lithuanians gave large autonomy to its subjects it only required taxes/military and you can have your own religion/ way of life

@lumumba57 @thecheapseats29 @RaniaKhalek "lets measure who had the worse genocides in history us or you" why are you downplaying the suffering of people to fit your agenda it's a disgrace what is happened/happening in Africa with the french monopoly forcing poverty. But in a time when you need compassion you spew hate
@MiaGeor50397893 @RaniaKhalek 🤔 but Lithuania in it's history never had colonies.
@RaniaKhalek Russia helped us in the 1971 war. And the west was against us. Bangladesh's warships are 95% Russian. Russia is currently developing a nuclear power plant. So we support Russia.
@Xtrilo1Xtrilo @BigFulkin @RaniaKhalek You don’t become the largest country in Europe without colonization. Ask the Austrians, Russians, Germans etc
@masteriggy @BigFulkin @RaniaKhalek Yes they were but did they colonise anything no, youre one search away on google yo proving hourself wrong.

@Hekatemarzanna @nesivyk @RaniaKhalek What the fuçk are you talking about ? What Lithuania has to do with your shít when throughout history Lithuania has been colonised million times? Learn your own country’s history goddamn.
